Okay. It is working now. Both versions are now activated fully. 

I have formatted my win7 as it was due and i think it has one virus. :( But one quick guide for others that NEVER UPDATE THE GAME as after patching when you start the game, one message pops up saying one latest version is available. DONT DOWNLOAD IT. I did so and then the game was not fully activated despite of reinstallation or registry cleaning. :)
